values:

MLAC2007: haha... go figure

Richenberg7588: do you think thats kinda wierd, i think its kinda sweet 
MLAC2007: as in boyfriend girlfriend... no... but... idk... he hurts me almost everyday treating me like i mean nothing to no one... but believe it or not i care about him alot so much and i would be there for him no matter what... he's still my best friend...i sometimes regret not letting him know that cause i'd hate for something to happen to me or him and him think that i hate him...

MLAC2007: no
Richenberg7588: im going to tell him to be nicer though 
MLAC2007: no
MLAC2007: dont
Richenberg7588: tell him tomarow to be nice

MLAC2007: and well he was mine... but love hurts...

MLAC2007: *sighs*

MLAC2007: like on friday

yea so i dont know what to say (i was talking to nicole about that... she was at her house...) yea... i am off to ponder... i dot know why i am crying...

cause i like joel so much... it's just retts my best friend and it feels good when he's nice to me... funny, that should be a requirement for best friend status... not in mic's book.. lol

x's and o's and a little bit of tears

Dig it deep,
And hold it there,
Watch as the knife,
Bleeds its share.
Inflicting the pain,
Just so it hurts,
Cutting the memories,
But cursing them first.
The feelings of hate,
The words that rhyme,
The tears that drench,
The blade every time.
Now I feel better,
A scar and a kiss,
Now its all over,
A hit and miss.

-I know what you're thinking-

Err. Mom doesnt know when to just stop. Okay, So I guess I have this bad habit of putting on a show of being happy when I really feel like crap... i just am that way, i hate ruining everyone elses day over me... inplus... no one seems to care anymore... I just always hate being asked whats wrong. but noooo... she doesn't get it, dont ask.... i hate that question, "What's wrong?"... my other friends always know whats wrong and never have to ask... feeling blah again...

my eyes are burning, my nose is running, my head is aching, and my chest is about to explode, and guess what?!?!? AP test is on monday! fucking A right? 

yea went to the movies with matt tonight.. he's so cute, him and hope are adorable.. i heard all the stories tonight... man i hope me and joel get like that... but one can only imagine until it happens...

i heard this quote today... "If you believe that dreams can come true, expect a few nightmares..."... hmmm, ponder that one for a bit...

as you might notice i am feeling a little bit crappy i suppose... wish i was with someone... i dont know whats the matter with me... when i am around people i get so into pretending i am happy that i begin to beilev it... but then 5 minutes after they leave and im alone, i am reminded how shitty life is... i wish i could have something like an inflatable friend... lol, ok maybe not to that extremem... but like someone who lived next door, so i could walk over and be like "Alright... make me happy!"

well i be going now to eat some grilled cheese and tomato soup...

x's and o's

hahaha, guess whats that about? chyuepp... going with, dating, girlfriend of Joel Crandall... or as nelly puts it, i'm his girl... teehee... k-mac said no... cause he'll "eat me alive" w/e thats suppose to mean... i dunno i'll figure it out... hes so fucking hott... and soooo much better and nicer than whats-his-face (haha, aka tree)... so yea mac's over and we are supposidly doing ap bio shit... *cough cough*... well i better head on out... 

x' and o's

Yea... so I was going through live journal and got this random girls journal up on here and i read her one and only entry... and it says what i feel... so i am going to steal what she says, i take no credit other than saying that i found it... i copied because... well thats how it is... at least i am telling you i am...

"i need to stop being so sad, except sadness just doesn't stop when you want it to. i wish it did though.
i think too much in the first place, and now that i'm sad, i'm thinking incredibly too much for my own good, since you know, it's making things worse on me.
i don't feel like crying and having my face be red and my eyes puffy, so i will hold them back the best that i can.
and whenever i'm like this, i get this huge knot in my throat and it's hard to breathe, correctly that is. "

yea... i've stopped crying... i mean... i couldn't stop myself when i started like so i had to just lay in the darkness in ym cave of sorrow and just beg God that i could fall asleep... fucking insomnia... fucking dreams... yea... i think about ryan moving, rett, tiara, mike.. everything... i cant take it.. i cant eat... i throw up when i do... i cant sleep i have horrible night mares if i do (i feel like a little kid saying that, but when you see your best friends all dead... you'd feel the same as i do)... idk... what is this all that i feel? depression.. maybe maybe not.. but i think i am going to lighten up when its just me and myself and let the world turn and jump into life... good idea? no... it wont work.. oh well.. i over think life... but then again.. who doesn't from time to time? the proble is it' 24/7 for me and i cant shut my brain off... blah

Cuz I miss you, body and soul so strong that it takes my breath away.
And I breathe you into my life and pray for the strength to stand today
Cuz I love you, whether it's wrong or right, though I can't be with you tonight... You know my heart is by your side...

Yea...Rudolph called and apologized yesterday...he was sincere about it... he's my best friend... i cant just leave him alone... i love him, i really do... he hurts so bad... i cry over him too much... he said every hateful and hurtful thing he said to me it wasn't true... he was... confused, lost, hurt, feeling lonely... yesterday at church i was tickling his back (he loves it, and i would go to his house every night to put him to sleep just so i can relax and think) it's the best way to think... he started rubbing my leg and grabbed my hand a few times... it was in the best friend love way... i missed his touch... i miss him.. but i have to control everything, hes got a new girlfriend... we talked about her yesterday, briefly, on the phone... i wonder if he loves her? i'll ask him one day.. he pretended to be happy for me about the whole mike thing... hmmm... what he doesn't understand is that i am not with mike because of him... out of all the hateful and hurtful things he said that nearly killed me, i still loved him for who he was... i knew it wasnt him fully speaking to me those days... he's my best friend, and i would do anything and everything for him, i'd die for him... would he do the same for me? i dunno... who knows? i really would put everything on the line for him to be happy... and i am right now... i am sacraficing my sanity, my heart, my love, my fellings for him to be happy with lindsey, i cant mess that up with him and her...he seems too happy, too satisfied... if only i could talk to her once... i want to see if she'll take care of him... i want to let her know that when he gets mad, let him cool off before she starts to try to make him happy again... that he likes soft and gentle voice at night... that he loves fun... he likes yellow and red underware... he may act like a kid all the time, but if you really need him for you to cry on his shoulder he'd be there in a second.. he talks sence into you if you're being stupid... he really does care, no matter what you may think... he'll do somethings without thinking and it'll sometimes ruin your plans with him or what you wanted to do, but justgo along with it, it usually turns out to be fun anyways... if he does something that you dont like at all or hurts you, tell him, nicely, he doesn't take hints and he responds better to you being straight forward...he has a guilty look to him when he's doing something wrong like stealing the lock off your locker or taking your hairtie so you wont put up your hair... dont make fun of his hips, he's sensitive about them... he loves cuddling and eating the plastic off his cups... that when he says "Trying something new" he means Diet Coke... he doesn't like chocolate... surprise him as much as you can, with little things and he'll smile, and that always brightened up my day... if you call him and wake him up, he'll pretend to not care and pretend he wants to stay on- trust me, he doesn't, let him sleep and tell him to call you later, if he doesn't call, call him, it means he didn't remember you two ever communticating... you'll know he loves you when he rubs your face with his hand and look into your eyes and flash his sweet smile and kiss you ever so gently... and if you sit and listen to him breathe on the phone, it gets softer and slower when he gets more and more tired fighting to stay awake with you while you are on past his 'bed time' but he'll always stay on if you ask... not to take him for granted cause she has the greatest guy... the one i love with every beat  of my heart and every breath i take... *sigh* i would do anything to end any of his pain... and i'll just step on out and let him run the show... yea... crying again... thinking of all that past with him hurts... i wish he was here so we could talk... maybe i could tell him and make sure he knows that i would cry if he died too, and i care about him so much that i loved/love him too, that if he ever needed to call- dont hesitate... i wish i told him how i felt on the phone yesterday... i blew it... like always... i always fuck things up... i wish i could tell him how sorry i am... if i could take it back and redo January 9th over again, i would, because what brught us closer together also broke us apart... *sigh*... i looked at those pictures of me and him for the first time n a few weeks... i wish we could go back... i set my heart up for the greatest fall... but we can only go forward in life i suppose... well i must go now.. sleep time...

if only he knew how i felt on the inside.. that what he sees on the outside is only the beginning... i actually am very happy for him and lindsey...

yea so rudolph is a mother fucker with no tact and wont drop anything... we dated, we broke up... we had a horrible break up.. oh well.. but dont fucking give me an envolope filled with our memories.. our poems and letters and pictures and notes and our song... throw it away on your own... dont give me that shit... i already burned my half.. fucker... leave me alone... go away! you say you dont give a fuck about me and that you wish i'd die.. yea well i wish that too... but it isn't happening apparently... i hate this shit... no one should feel the way i do now...dont try to give MY FRIENDS the envolope to give me... fuck you rudolph... figure it out.. we are over... be happy you have a new girlfriend... ryan (may i inforce that he is YOUR BEST FRIEND) told lyndsey to watch out cause you cant commit... you ass hole... you always argue with me saying i am a whore saying that i am the type of person who needs a fuck buddy, who needs all that... that i am a "phsyco with mental problems"... yea you would be just a little fucked up too if you've gotten hit ever since you could remmeber.... you fucking cock...cant handle it all can you? yea no one can... i dont blame you for that... when i told you about it you asked how i could be so nice, with a smile on my face pretending its all ok... it b/c of asses like you... why do i have to tell people about that shit that happens at my house just so they can tell me i am a phsyco later on? as if it's all my fault... 
 yea so whatever... you can pretend that you dont care... but we all know you do... your just mad b/c you cant take responsibility... that you couldn't just have me and no one else look at me... that i couldn't have a perfect family like yours... that i couldn't just... no it's not my fault... it's yours... and when i look around... i see other friends that love me for who i am... my drama friends, dana, kayla, ryan, michelle, mike everyone... just... go away... stop singleing me out .... you like having fun and picking on me when no ones around.... you love walking all over me... because you know i am scared of you... bet that felt good... yea... so all i have to say is, thanks for admitting today that you never liked me and you used me for sex and never cared and you could care less if i died... because we all know you like to trick yourself when you hurt... haha... it is funny to me b/c your best friend is on my side... your loosing more than you thought you would... you thought i would loose in the end... haha

Rudolph sucks... he's left me for good... ass hole... "I dont ever want to talk to you again... this best friends thing wont work..."  Try to blame me for it...fuck you... you just cant face up to real problems and have the balls to tell me that you liked someone else.. you hate me because you dont want to deal with my dad... with me... with anyone... I defended you in fights with my friends... Ryan, your fucking best friend, even tried to tell me you were a fucking cock hole who used me... for sex... for pleasure... whatever... why did i listen to him? you fucked up real bad this time.. you cant fix it with the way you are... fuck you...did you ever love me like you said? no.. probably not... i wish i could die and see if you'd care... probably not... you'd just say "Oh, man... well there's goes my playtoy... who will be next?"... for linsdey's sake i hope you do love her and i hope you do settle down... poor thing doesn't know what shes getting into... she doesn't have ryan to comfort her... but if you do  mess with her like you did with me ryan is going to kick your sorry little ass... he wanted to do it over me... he says your a fucking dick head for what you have done to me... but being me i stopped him from killing you... i ,yet again, defended you when i knew you were wrong... just leave me alone... poor ryan is fucking leaving and you had to even do this shit to him... he's all stressed out because of it.. i'm glad he knows the way you are... because if he didn't, he wouldn't talk to me... i have stopped... i want you to know just try to atleast get along until ryan leaves... then do whatever the fuck you want... spit on me for all i care.... but wait till he leaves... i want him happy... and this isn't making him happy... you think of no one but yourself and your happiness... here's a little song for you...

"Stupid Kid"

There are things that used to make me smile
One of them was you for just a little while
You left me for dead so far away
I replace you with fear and shame
You'll be happy on the day that I die

There are things that used to make me laugh
But now they're deeply buried in the past
I left them there so far away
Replaced my humor with my pain
I'll be happy the day that it dies

Remember when I said I love you
Well forget it I take it back
I was just a stupid kid back then
I take back everyword I said

There are things that used to make you cry
One of them was me for just a little while
Why is it that you had to say Goodbye
In your special little way

Remember when I said I love you
Well forget it I tak it back
I was just a stupid kid back then
I take back everyword i said

- Alkaline Trio

Yeah... so there you go...
All these feelings i feel now.. why does it still hurt to see you? *sigh* i like to pretend to the others in the group that i am over you as they call you names... even kayla calls you names... yea... why do i want to scream out "Shut up, he's my best friend, he's not like that... you dont understand.. he's going through a phase! he'll be back.. he always does come back"
No not this time huh? yea... i must learn... i want a boyfriend so you can get jealous... i see your face when i talk to nick.. you want to come over and kill him... haha... i give you my " you know you want it... but you cant have it you little peice of shit" face... ryan loves that face... so another day passes with out you... and i miss you less with everyday that you're gone...

I decided to write a few Blink 182 songs down... because... i feel like it...

"Here's Your Letter"

Cut the skin to the bone
Fall asleep all alone
Hear your voice in the dark
Loose myself in your eyes
Choke my voice Say godnight
Fuck I can't let this kill me... let go
I need some more time to fix this

But the words get confused
And the conversation dies
Apologize for the past
Talk some shit, take it back
Are we cursed to this life?

Fuck I can't let this kill me... let go
I need some more time to fix this problem

I'm talking to the ceiling
My life just lost all meaning
Do one thing for me tonight
I'm dieing in this silence

The last star left in heaven
It's falling down to earth and
Do you still feel the same way?

Fuck I can't let this kill me... let go
I need some more time to fix this problem
I need some more time to fix this...


"I'm Lost Without You"

I swear that I can go on forever again
Please let me know when my one bad day will end
I will go down as your lover, your friend
Give me your lips and with one kiss we begin

Are you afraid of being alone?
Cause I am... I'm lost without you
Are you afriad of leaving tonight?
Cause I am... I'm lost with out you

I'll leave my room open till sunrise for you
I'll keep my eyes patiently focused on you
Where are you now?
I can hear footsteps... I'm dreaming
And if you will keep me from waking, to believe this

Are you afriad of being alone?
Cause I am... I'm lost without you
Are you afraid of leaving tonight?
Cause I am... I'm lost without you


"Always"

I've been here before a few times
And I'm quite aware we're dieing
And yourhands they shake of goodbyes
And I'll take you back if you'd have me

So here I am, I'm trying
So here i am, are you ready?

Come on let me hold you
Touch you
Feel you
Always
Kiss you
Taste you
All night
Always

And I'll miss your laugh, your smile
I'll admit I'm wrong if you'd tell me
I'm so sick of fights, I hate them
Lets start this agin for real

So here I am, I'm trying
So here I am, are you ready?

Come on let me hold you
Touch you
Feel you
Always
Kiss you
Taste you
All night
Always

You say you love me
You say you miss me
You say you need me
You say you're jealous of the other guys
You say I'm the best never to be replaced
You say you dream of me
You say I am beautiful
You say I have what you need and more
You say I am your best friend and I say you're mine
You say you miss my smell
You say you miss my taste
You say you miss my laugh
You say it all....
But the things you dont say are what you need to say...
You need to say "How about a movie?"
You need to say "Can I kiss you?"
You need to say "Lets be together"
You need to say "You're my one and only"
But the things you dont say are the things you need to say...
So what can i say?

Let me tell you, seven long nights in a row is killing me... sister tried to kill herself and guess who found her on the floor in her blood?? yeupp yeupp, lucky contestant #1... been at the hospital... she came home and we've been talking, i've been trying to convince her i love her... thats draining... mentally and physically... everyone has a secret they'd like to keep... death is a crazy thing... watching my best friend being hit by a car right infront of me, and holding onto her hand hoping to take the pain away from her as God came for her soul... why do i go back to that memory after so long? ug... yeupp, death is crazy... it's crazy to think it's already predesigned for you on how you die and when... that someone is saying "She will die this way..." i dunno, why do i speak about dieing? yeah... so on other notes...
went to my friends bday par-tay after the play on friday... let me tell you i was not welcomed at all... she use to claim to be my best friend.. yeah i never had the heart to tell her that i could never trust her and that she doesn't know anything about me... the only two person who knows me 100% and still loves me is... oh yeah i told myself i wouldn't put names down... we'll call him... Rudolph (yeah no one would get that nickname except him...) heneways... i had to go somewhere on friday night unwelcomed and feeling pretty uncomfortable... recieving dirty looks all night from the "birthday girl"... then at 2a.m., when everyone else was sleeping, my other friend asked if me and her could talk... and let me tell you i was soooo overjoyed to be at least spoken to (sarcastic).... me and her were talking until 4:45 in the morning, and then went to bed and woke up at 8:30 (yay!)... then i decided to go surfing and then to the pool with my sister... and then while i was outside hosing off the tanning oil, my friend from drama called me, which, let me tell ya, was a big surprise and made me feel loved... well anyways, i went to Triplets of Bellville with my two friends (you've gotta see it! it's really amazing, the animation is very original and the dog is my favourite!)... apart from feeling accepted, i was having a really good relaxing time... we went back to one of their houses and watched Family Guy (why the fuck Fox cancelled it still elludes me) and then went to school for the play... which is alot of fun... i am in a whole nother world during the play, not only on stage but off it too... always perfecting your performance (even with my two lines!!)... man all the girls in this play are so beautiful... just being in the same performance with them is intimidating... maybe one day in a couple of years some freshman will think the same about me... maybe not... oh well... we went to the cast party... i didn't want to drink... oh well, i still did... theres me, the chameleon... all the drinking i did made me depressed and it was bad... i didn't want to start crying, cause i was so worried about my sister... so i crawled up on my friends lap and slept... he took care of me... it was really nice of him... i feel bad now... he shouldn't have to... i should of just got someother ride home or something... *sigh*...my sister kept calling me during the party cause she got stoned with her boyfriend and she got in one of those moods that was driving me nuts... i am 15... i am not suppose to be taking care of my sister like this... thats what parents are for... fucking no good parents of mine are never home, and blamed me for my sister cutting herself... of coarse it's my fault... i was suppose to be watching her making sure she was ok... i am suppose to make her dinner everynight, making sure she does her homework, making sure she brushes her teeth before she goes to bed... while my parents are off not caring about us... well fuck them... once i get my fucking car, me and my sister are out of here for the whole summer living on icing and pop tarts with Rudolph and my sisters boyfriend... for the whole summer... just driving...


***Song of the day***

Round n' round
Carousel
Has got you under it's spell
Moving so fast...but
Going nowhere

Up n' down
Ferris wheel
Tell me how does it feel
To be so high...
Looking down here

Is it lonley?
Lonley?
Lonley?

Did the clown
Make you smile?
He was only your fool for a while
Now he's gone back home
And left you wandering here

Is it lonley?
Lonley?
Lonley?


-"Carnival Town" by Norah Jones
